page.description: Retrieve a list of users from either machine or domain specified by 'Location.' If no parameters are specified, it will retrieve the users from the current machine.
page.syntax: User_List as C = API_GetUsers([C Location [,L lDomain [,C type ]]])

argument.name: User_List
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of users.

argument.name: Location
argument.description: Optional. Default = the name of the current computer. The name of a computer or a domain.

argument.name: lDomain
argument.description:
Logical. Optional. Default = .F.
.T. = Location refers to a domain.
.F. = Location refers to a computer.

page.discussion: The API_GETUSERS() function returns a CR-LF delimited list of users of a computer or domain.
